title: iTuvaNTi bAdhala
sahitya:
iTuvaNTi bAdhala beTTidE Emi sEyadunayya mAyayyA


anupallavi

  vaTa patra shayanA nI mahEtsavavambu sEyuvELalOna


caraNam 1    bhAgIrathi salilamu tOTi pancAmrtamu gAvinci 
shrI gandhamu mRna naladipUlacE shrngAramuncu vELalana
    caraNam 2    anuvu gAnu koluvu maNTamu aparanji kAnti mereyanamarcci 
ghana tambUra cEtambuni nI guNa gAnamu sEyu vELalana
    caraNam 3    pUla cayyapai ninu vEncEpu jEsi ponduga pAlArakimpa jEsi 
lALi bADiyucu vELala gOpAladAsanuta pApapu rOgamu
